build: lithe and hypnotic with sinuous curves
distinguishing_features: warm golden skin, long flowing ebony hair adorned with white lotus pins, almond-shaped dark brown eyes with hypnotic intensity, full pouty lips, intricate sak yant lotus tattoo on left shoulder that seems to subtly shift, faint lotus-shaped burn scar on right palm from spirit pact
